name: Wanted (AdventureBox)
description:
Congratulations, You're now the new sheriff! 

Time to risk life and limb taking out the bandits that have made the town their new hangout!

Tips for the best player experience:

  • Use Google Chrome
  • Disable AdBlock if installed on your device
  • The game plays on Android devices as well

To make, play and share your own online games, visit https://www.adventurebox.com
